page.title: 09RUSKINGTON'S POLICEMAN
page.content: THE LOCAL POLICE Our local policeman has been in the force for five and a half years.He went to the recent pit strike,altogether he went to 25 pits in 7 counties.He has never fired a gun on the street,but he has fired a magnum 317 at a target.A P.c'. duty is to keep the peace,detect and prevent the crime and work with the community,schools,the parish councils and youth groups.Headquarters never send a policeman more than 15 minutes away.The Ruskington station only owns one car and has cones, warning boards,first aid kit,a tape measure,a brief case of paper work, a shovel and a bright lamp.It takes two years to become a policeman.You have a ten week course to start,then five two week courses over the two years probation.
